Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Class ErrorCollector

java.lang.Object
lanat.parsing.errors.ErrorCollector
public class ErrorCollector extends Object
Handles all errors generated by the parser and tokenizer.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ErrorCollector

      public ErrorCollector(@NotNull @NotNull List<@NotNull Token> fullTokenList, @NotNull @NotNull String fullInputString)
      Instantiates a new errors collector.
      Parameters:
      fullTokenList - the full list of tokens that were passed to the main parser
      fullInputString - the full input string that was passed to the main parser

  • Method Details

    • collect

      public void collect(@NotNull @NotNull Command command)
      Collects all the errors from the given command.

      Gets the errors from (in order):

      1. Tokenizer
      2. Parser
      3. Arguments
      4. Custom errors added to the Command
      Parameters:
      command - the command to collect the errors from

    • handleErrors

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<@NotNull String> handleErrors()
      Handles all the errors that were collected. This method will return a list of formatted error messages.
      The errors are sorted by their absolute index in the input.
      Returns:
      a list of formatted error messages
